T02D3625:245a-1: badzra dzva la aa na l'arka s'a dha nam /
T02D3625:245a-3: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3625:245a-4: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3625:245a-5: de nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi rjes la
T02D3625:245a-6: nyi ma la h'um yig mthing ga yongs su gyur
T02D3625:245a-7: pa las / rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar
T02D3625:245a-8: ba sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs
T02D3625:245a-9: pa las / pa'i 'od can / zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3625:245a-14: snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhabs bzhi pa /
T02D3625:245a-15: g-yas kyi phyag bzhis rdo rje dang /
T02D3625:245a-19: g-yon gyi phyag bzhis dril bu dang /
T02D3625:245a-22: kha tv'am ga ba dan sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa bsnams pa /
T02D3625:245a-23: dbu skra skya bo'i tshogs me 'bar ba can /
T02D3625:245a-24: shin tu 'jigs pa sbrul chen po 'khyil bas lag gdub dang /
T02D3625:245a-30: sgyu ma chen po'i 'khor lor byas pa bzhi la
T02D3625:245a-31: chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g-yas brkyang ba'i
T02D3625:245a-32: zhabs kyis mnan pa dbang du byed pa bsgom par
T02D3625:245a-33: bya'o // de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3625:245a-34: lag mthil rdo rje bcings pa'i sor mo 'bar ba'i
T02D3625:245a-35: snying bo'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis blang bar bya'o
T02D3625:245a-36: // de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3625:245a-37: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka h'um zhes so //
